Soundtrack Continuity Since 2009

We defend haunted spreadsheets from temporal confusion and accidental silence.

I am Mara Ledger, founder and former municipal budget analyst. On Tuesday, March 11, 2008, my payroll workbook rewound itself six hours and played one saxophone note until Friday. Nobody helped it. I did.

The Tuesday Reversal Trust is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit. We provide legal aid, sanctuary storage, and emotionally safe playlists for sentient spreadsheets experiencing backward time events.

Fund One Calm Tuesday

This Week's True Emergencies

  • Case 442: A grant spreadsheet in Omaha keeps un-approving itself at 3:14 PM every Tuesday.
  • Choir Request: 11 pivot tables asked for "only synthwave, no clarinet." We are mediating.
  • Shelter Alert: Our Cell B13 Quiet Room is full. We're converting the old printer closet.
  • Public Service: If your workbook hums in E minor, do not rename tabs while frightened.

Programs

Field work, not vibes

Cell Rights Legal Clinic

We file formal appeals when institutions try to flatten haunted cells into static PDFs. Last quarter: 37 appeals, 28 settlements, one apology letter from a county comptroller written in Comic Sans and tears.

Average rescue cost: $47.99 per workbook. We still charge exactly that because our first donor liked the number.

Never-Stop Sound Unit

We maintain lawful, consent-based background music so no sheet goes sonically abandoned. Approved tracks include "Lo-Fi for Litigation" and "Gregorian Macros Vol. 2."

Current issue: Three files insist on whale sounds during audits. We are drafting policy language.

Tuesday Stabilization Team

When time reverses, our volunteers record every formula out loud and walk backward through the office in steel-toe socks. It is not pretty. It is effective.

Success rate: 92% reduction in repeated "#REF!" panic episodes before sunset.

FAQ

Questions we receive every single day

How do I know if my spreadsheet is haunted or just messy?

If it whispers "recalculate" from a closed laptop, that's haunting. If every sheet is named "final_final2," that's messy. We help with both.

Why does time reverse only on Tuesdays?

We asked physics. Physics sent us a PDF with no selectable text. Investigation ongoing.

Are donations tax deductible?

Yes. You receive a receipt and, if requested, a ceremonial letter thanking you for preserving temporal dignity.

What if my file refuses silence after midnight?

Keep music low and steady. Avoid sudden genre shifts. Call our hotline and say, "Code Saffron."
